thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 3 of 59
thread.title: Kate Kramer
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Kate Kramer

author: Kate Kramer
title: Kate Kramer
text: McGowan was excellent throughout helping me book this room block, even though I changed the dates on him twice! He was gracious, efficient, and responsive throughout the process. I got a courtesy room block with excellent terms, allowing for flexibility and variation in guest bookings. Skipper rocks!
